original: intros m x H1 H2. split. - intros H3 H4. split; intros H5; apply planar_I; try auto. + apply weak_planarity_criterion_0; auto. + apply expf_planar_0; auto. - intros H3 H4. split; intros H5. + apply inversion_planarity; try auto. apply succ_I with (x:=x); auto. + apply inv_hmap_L_B; auto.
